title: jimmyskqa
author: jimmyskqa
content: I just notice somethingWhy everyone start staking on Gither rather than Lido ?https://i.ibb.co/ZNLd1gd/screenshot.png

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: The Gither has more than half as much commission as the Lido: 4.5% for the Gither versus 10% for the Lido. Plus Gither has more staking ETH than Lido: 4.181 M versus Lido's 3.613 M. Thus, it is clear that staking ETH is more profitable with Gither than with Lido.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: The fees charged by each platform should have already given you the answer already but I guess you are still wondering because of the platform's reputation or security. I never heard of Gither until you posted this but they seem to be reputable as well. It's been audited by the Ethereum Foundation as they claim on their site.
